scripts.install:xk6:linux: docker run --rm -it -e GOOS=linux -u "$(id -u):$(id -g)" -v "${PWD}:/xk6" grafana/xk6 build v0.42.0 --with github.com/grafana/xk6-output-prometheus-remote
scripts.isntall:xk6:mac: docker run --rm -it -e GOOS=darwin -u "$(id -u):$(id -g)" -v "${PWD}:/xk6" grafana/xk6 build v0.42.0 --with github.com/grafana/xk6-output-prometheus-remote
scripts.test:local: npm run webpack && K6_TOPOLOGY_NAME=sender K6_CLUSTER_NODES=local K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_TREND_AS_NATIVE_HISTOGRAM=true K6_OUT=xk6-prometheus-rw K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=https://prometheus.staging.hoprnet.link/api/v1/write ./k6 run ./dist/send-messages.test.js
scripts.test:many2many: npm run webpack && K6_TOPOLOGY_NAME=many2many K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_TREND_AS_NATIVE_HISTOGRAM=true K6_OUT=xk6-prometheus-rw K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=https://prometheus.staging.hoprnet.link/api/v1/write ./k6 run --summary-export=test-execution-local.json --tag testid=local ./dist/send-messages.test.js
scripts.test:uhttp: npm run webpack && K6_TOPOLOGY_NAME=many2many K6_CLUSTER_NODES=uhttp K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_TREND_AS_NATIVE_HISTOGRAM=true K6_OUT=xk6-prometheus-rw K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=https://prometheus.staging.hoprnet.link/api/v1/write ./k6 run --summary-export=test-execution-local.json --tag testid=local ./dist/send-messages.test.js

scripts.setup:uhttp: npm run build && K6_TOPOLOGY_NAME=uhttp K6_CLUSTER_NODES=uhttp node ./dist/setup-environment.js
scripts.setup:team: npm run build && K6_TOPOLOGY_NAME=many2many K6_CLUSTER_NODES=team node ./dist/setup-environment.js
scripts.parse:results: node parse-results.js test-execution-20240522-113543.json many2many sanity-check 1 test-2.1.0 30
